name: MEMEmsg Site
tagline: There is a MEME for that!
body:
### Welcome to MEMEmsg
### What is this?
MEMEmsg is an iMessage extension that lets you create MEMEs from photos and use it right within iMessage on your iOS device.

### Why can't you give me a bunch of popular images from movies?
Working on it. I take copyright seriously but they will be coming soon.

### Privacy
We do not collect any data on you or your photos.

### Support or Contact
If you are having trouble with MEMEmsg, shoot a quick email to support@burag.com with the subject line Support - MEMEmsg. Bonus points if you include a meme :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
